content: बभ्रु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भृ-कु द्वित्वं; बभ्र्-उ वा <ls>Uṇ. 1. 21</ls>] {@--1@} Deep-brown, tawny, reddish-brown; ज्वालाबभ्रुशिरोरुहः <ls>R. 15. 16</ls>; <ls n="R.">19. 25</ls>; बबंध बालारुणबभ्रु वल्कलं <ls>Ku. 5. 8.</ls> {@--2@} Bald-headed through disease. --भ्रुः {@--1@} Fire. {@--2@} An ichneumon. {@--3@} The tawny colour. {@--4@} A man with tawny hair. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Yādava; <ls>Śi. 2. 40.</ls> {@--6@} An epithet of Śiva. {@--7@} Of Viṣṇu. {@--8@} The Cātaka bird. {@--9@} A sweeper, cleaner. {@--10@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} A tawny or brown colour. {@--2@} Any object of a brown colour.
